page.title: 11A Warton Family's Thoughts
page.content: We came from Worcestershire in 1978 after a Lancashire holiday when we decided to live here. Being near the M6, some lovely countryside and the Lakes has great appeal. Warton is not a big village, is not overall an old village and has a comfortable "lived-in" feel. We are most happy here. We have been involved with school activities, including the School Assoc. Our son attends the local school after his sisters who both enjoy being in the church choir very much. Again, both girls have been members of the Girl Guides, although only the middle child now attends. Warton has no "night" life except the local pubs and the occasional "do" at the Village Hall but it's a good place to live and bring up children. H. FAMILY
